item.title: Sentinel Eye: Cloud-Native Land-Use Detection
item.description:

üõ∞Ô∏è Project Overview

Sentinel Eye is a production-grade monitoring system designed to detect illegal deforestation and urban encroachment in protected areas of the Amazon rainforest. By processing multi-temporal Sentinel-2 imagery (2021-2024), the platform identifies environmental threats and triggers automated alerts to agencies like park rangers.

Live Demo: sentinel-eye-psi.vercel.app

üèóÔ∏è Architecture & Cloud Infrastructure

I architected a decoupled, event-driven, serverless backend on AWS to handle high-compute geospatial tasks while maintaining sub-second API response times.
